import React,{Component}from"react";import CourseForm from"./comp/CourseForm";import CourseList from"./comp/CourseList";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";class App extends Component{constructor(props){super(props);// update course
this.updateCourse=e=>{this.setState({current:e.target.value});};// add course
this.addCourse=e=>{e.preventDefault();let current=this.state.current;let courses=this.state.courses;courses.push({name:current});this.setState({courses,current:""});};// delete course
this.deleteCourse=index=>{let courses=this.state.courses;courses.splice(index,1);this.setState({courses});};// edit course 
this.editCourse=(index,value)=>{let courses=this.state.courses;let course=courses[index];course['name']=value;this.setState({courses:courses});};this.state={courses:[{name:"html"},{name:"css"},{name:"js"}],current:""};}render(){const{courses}=this.state;const courseList=courses.map((course,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CourseList,{det:course,index:index,deleteCourse:this.deleteCourse,editCourse:this.editCourse},index));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CourseForm,{updateCourse:this.updateCourse,addCourse:this.addCourse,current:this.state.current}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[courseList," "]})]});}}export default App;
